main event: A deputy sheriff observed an unidentified flying object over Gregory, Texas, for approximately 2.5 hours on August 5, 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as resembling a round kite,The object was multi-colored with a yellow light on top,The observer initially received a report from an unidentified woman about the sighting,The object remained in place and appeared to spin at times,The officer concluded that it might have been a weather balloon launched from Corpus Christi Naval Air Station.
sighted object: one multi-colored object resembling a round kite
witness description: Deputy Sheriff William S. from Gregory, Texas
